content: {{knowledge objective |Identifiant=OIC-075-03-B |Item_parent=Smoking addiction |Item_parent_short=Smoking addiction |Rank=B |Title=Know the definition of the electronic cigarette |Description=Basic principle of operation |Rubric=Definition |Contributors= |Order=3}} * Mixture (propylene glycol + nicotine + water + flavourings + glycerol) propelled in the form of vapour and inhaled. * To date, no adverse reactions or cases of intoxication have been reported. * Possible allergic reactions * Considered as consumer products.

question.question: What is the basic principle of operation of an electronic cigarette?
question.option_a: It is a device that converts nicotine into a liquid solution
question.option_b: It is a device that heats a liquid mixture of propylene glycol, nicotine, water, flavorings, and glycerol to produce a vapor that is inhaled
question.option_c: It is a device that uses a battery to heat a metal coil to produce a smoke that is inhaled
question.option_d: It is a device that uses a combination of nicotine and oxygen to produce a vapor that is inhaled
